articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Microsoft president comments on discovery of new Russian hacking attempts
articles.description: Microsoft has uncovered new Russian-linked hacking attempts ahead of the midterm elections. Microsoft President and Chief Legal Officer Brad Smith joins Andrea Mitchell to discuss.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Russian hackers targeting conservative anti-Trump think tanks
articles.description: There are new claims today that Russia is trying to influence the midterm elections. The latest hack attempt is almost identical to 2016, with one very big difference. New York Times digital reporter Sheera Frankel joins Ali Velshi with the latest details.

articles.title: Is Hillary Clinton the right person to help Dems retake control?
articles.description: The DNC is in a fundraising slump and Hillary Clinton is getting back in the game. The former presidential candidate hopes to make an impact on the 2018 midterm elections through fundraising. Is she the right person to help Democrats retake control of the Hou…
